Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Biomedical Material/Reagent/Diagnostic Reagent/Candida Albicans Skin Test Reagent
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A culture filtrate of cells of Candida Albicans propagated in a chemically defined medium and used as a recall antigen to evaluate cellular immunity in infection, cancer, and other disease states. (NCI)
